QuestData.Title: Artificial Intelligence
QuestData.Description: <A feminine voice addresses you over the portable terminal.>$B$BEmergency code: 55-729.$B$BUpper cerebral cortex functions in expedition members have been compromised.$B$BPlease report to your nearest terminal location, to the southeast of the Sunstone Terrace, for further analysis.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to the A.I.D.A. terminal at the Surveyor's Outpost in Uldum.
QuestData.CompletionText: <The terminal whirrs as its mechanisms become active.>
QuestData.RewardText: Scanning subject...$B$BCerebral cortex diagnostics indicate the absence of "tomb curse" phenomenon.$B$BDiagnostics did reveal frequent head trauma. The user would do well to exercise more caution around blunt objects in the future.
